elements.content: To help us prepare our trainers for your training, as well as to help us build the appropriate teacher support tools for Boston STEM week, please take a few minutes to respond to the following questions:

elements.name: what-grades
elements.label: What grade levels are you teaching this school year? (please check all that apply)

elements.name: teaching-subjects
elements.label: What subjects are you teaching this school year? (please check all that apply)

elements.name: degree-subjects
elements.label: Do you have a college degree in any of the following subjects?

elements.name: years-teaching
elements.label: At the end of this school year how many years of school teaching experience will you have?

elements.name: matrixInput
elements.label: How well prepared do you currently feel to:
rows: Teach a one-week immersive STEM course to your students at school

elements.name: matrixInput
elements.label: How often do you currently engage in the following teaching practices with your class(es)?
columns: Occasionally, but less than once a month
rows: Students work collaboratively in small groups
Students are given openended challenges with multiple “correct” answers

elements.name: recruited
elements.label: How were you recruited to participate in this program?  (select all that apply)
options: I heard about this program and wanted to sign up.
My principal told us to sign up if we wanted to do this program.
My principal told us we would be doing this program.
One of the other teachers told me about this program and encouraged me to apply.

elements.name: pd-interest
elements.label: How interested are you in taking pd for the upcoming Boston STEM week course implementation?

elements.name: pd-interest
elements.label: How often do you go online to obtain instructional resources for your lessons during the regular school year?

elements.name: websites
elements.label: What websites do you currently visit to obtain instructional resources for your lessons during the regular school year?
About how many hours total per week do you use any of the following?
elements.name: hours-per-week
options: A learning management system (LMS), e.g., Schoology, Blackboard, Moodle
